meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

vlive.korean: [지민이의 웃음 지뢰가 눌려버렸다] 뭐해요? 뭐해요? 뭐해? [JIMIN burst into laughter] What are you doing? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.96

examples.korean: He went off to sulk in his room. 발음듣기 그가 부루퉁해서 자기 방으로 가 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He went off to sulk in his room. 발음

examples.korean: The birds took fright and flew off. 발음듣기 새들이 놀라서 날아가 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The birds took fright and flew off. 발음

examples.korean: She cleaved his skull (in two) with an axe. 발음듣기 그녀가 도끼로 그의 두개골을 (둘로) 쪼개 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She cleaved his skull (in two) with an axe. 발음

examples.korean: The new road building programme has been ditched. 발음듣기 그 도로 신설 계획은 내팽개쳐져 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The new road building programme has been ditched. 발음

examples.korean: We spent the day punting on the river. 발음듣기 우리는 삿대젓는일로 하루를 다 써버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We spent the day punting on the river. 발음
